source.name: European Food Safety Authority
source.description: The European Food Safety Authority (EFSA) is an independent European agency which provides scientific advice on existing and emerging risks, as part of European Union (EU) risk assessments regarding food and feed safety.

news.title: Why Afghanistan Is Worried About The Meaty Feasts Of Eid Al-Adha
news.summary: Eid al-Adha, an important Muslim holiday, starts on Monday in many countries. The Festival of Sacrifice, which marks Abraham's willingness to sacrifice his son, Isaac, involves days of feasting and celebration.

news.title: Why Afghanistan Is Worried About The Meaty Feasts Of Eid Al-Adha
news.summary: An Afghan boy carries a sheep on his shoulder at a livestock market on September 22, 2015, just ahead of the Eid al-Adha festival in Kabul.

blogs.title: Why Afghanistan Is Worried About The Meaty Feasts Of Eid Al-Adha
blogs.summary: The way animals are transported and slaughtered for the major Muslim holiday has health officials concerned about the threat of Crimean-Congo hemorrhagic fever.
